About Me

BIO

Since 2003, I have been involved in some aspect of web development. I currently create anything from small static sites to dynamic database-backed portals and data collection tools for fortune 500 companies. Every day, I try to learn something new to both expand my knowledge, as well as to find more efficient, user-friendly ways to develop websites.

Matao Designs

Full Stack Developer (2003-Current)

As a full-stack web designer/developer, I am responsible for the design, layout and coding of websites. I am involved with the technical and graphical aspects of the websites, as well as the maintenance and updates of existing sites.

I use a multitude of technologies to perform my job so that I can provide the best quality output for my clients.

Gongos Inc.

Senior Programmer 2015 - Current

As a senior programmer, I am responsible for the creation of data-collection tools using C#.Net, HTML5, CSS, JavaScript among others.

I contribute in weekly client calls and meetings to ensure projects stay on course as well as answer any technical questions or concerns. I also work with various teams on a daily basis to collaborate on projects as well as assist in training of new employees.
